messages.subject: children as humans
messages.msgSnippet: ... going to do with his stuff and his room.
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>One little girls asked all kinds of questions about what we were
going to do with his stuff and his room. <<<<<<<<


Cameron's best friend, Jacob, died when they were five. Cameron was *very*
interested in what was going to happen to Jacob. His family was originally from
Ohio, so I told him that they were flying Jacob up there to bury him. Cameron
wanted to know *where* Jacob would sit. <g>

We discussed coffins and the baggage area and dog crates and airplanes.

We discussed burial and "getting fired" (cremated <g>) and burial-at-sea.

Still, when thunder rolls in the summer, he'll say that Jacob's bowling
again! <g>

Children as humans----interesting thread title.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
